alert.note: Alert for East Polk; McMinn; Northwest Monroe; Southeast Monroe; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cherokee, northeastern Polk, southeastern McMinn and southwestern Monroe Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Ducktown, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Etowah, Tellico Plains, Coker Creek, Violet, Citico, Turtletown, Bullet Creek, Reliance, Archville and Hiwassee Ocoee State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; McMinn; Northwest Monroe; Southeast Monroe; West Polk
